title: Understanding React Hooks: A Comprehensive Guide
author: Jane Doe
summary: This blog post provides an in-depth explanation of React Hooks, including useState, useEffect, and custom hooks, with examples to help you understand how to use them in your projects.

title: CSS Grid vs. Flexbox: When to Use Which?
author: John Smith
summary: A comparison of CSS Grid and Flexbox, exploring the strengths and weaknesses of each layout model. Learn when to choose Grid over Flexbox, or how to combine them for responsive design.

title: 10 JavaScript Performance Optimization Tips
author: Alice Johnson
summary: Discover ten essential tips for optimizing JavaScript performance in your web applications, including best practices for code splitting, lazy loading, and reducing memory leaks.

title: Building Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) from Scratch
author: Michael Lee
summary: Learn how to create Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) from scratch, including setting up service workers, caching strategies, and adding PWA features like offline support and push notifications.
